member.name: P:SpanishPoint.Azure.Iswc.Api.Label.V1.ISWCMetadata.ParentISWC
member.summary: A preferred ISWC of a parent of this ISWC. Presence of this field indicates that the ISWC merged to the parent.

member.name: P:SpanishPoint.Azure.Iswc.Api.Label.V1.ISWCMetadata.LinkedISWC
member.summary: All linked preferred ISWCs. Presence of this field indicates that those ISWCs merged to this ISWC.

member.name: P:SpanishPoint.Azure.Iswc.Api.Label.V1.ISWCMetadata.OverallParentISWC
member.summary: The preferred ISWC that is at the top of the chain of ISWCs.

member.name: P:SpanishPoint.Azure.Iswc.Api.Label.V1.Submission.PreferredIswc
member.summary: The preferred ISWC

member.name: P:SpanishPoint.Azure.Iswc.Api.Label.V1.Submission.PreviewDisambiguation
member.summary: If this field is set to true, the submission will not be saved to the ISWC database if there are multiple matches. If this field is set to false or is not provided, the submission will be saved to the ISWC database.

member.name: P:SpanishPoint.Azure.Iswc.Api.Label.V1.Submission.DisableAddUpdateSwitching
member.summary: If this field is set to true, the submission will be rejected if a submission already exists for the provided Agency Work Code.

member.name: P:SpanishPoint.Azure.Iswc.Api.Label.V1.Submission.AllowProvidedIswc
member.summary: If this field is set to false, the submission will be rejected if the preferredIswc value cannot be found in the database. If this field is set to true and the preferredIswc value cannot be found in the database, a new ISWC record will be created with the value provided.

member.name: P:SpanishPoint.Azure.Iswc.Api.Label.V1.Submission.DetailLevel
member.summary: Allow the return of limited ISWC metadata

member.name: P:SpanishPoint.Azure.Iswc.Api.Label.V1.SubmissionBatch.SubmissionId
member.summary: A unique submission identifier for this request. The same identifier will be populated for the submission in the response.
